title: Episode 116: Attentive Listening with AG (Mueller, She Wrote)
itunes:title: Episode 116: Attentive Listening with AG (Mueller, She Wrote)
itunes:subtitle: Content Warning: This episode contains discussions of sexual assault and PTSD. Kate finds a great, new hyaluronic acid and sets up an unexpected office space ,while Doree changes her tune on pimple patches and finds her tidying-up intention ...
description:
Content Warning: This episode contains discussions of sexual assault and PTSD.

 

Kate finds a great, new hyaluronic acid and sets up an unexpected office space ,while Doree changes her tune on pimple patches and finds her tidying-up intention to be a wild success. Then their guest AG, the semi-anonymous host of the podcasts Mueller, She Wrote and The Daily Beans, joins the show to discuss how she developed her voice in the female political podcast space, what self-care looks like when reading the news is a part of her job, and how she cultivates hope.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

 

  • HYDRANT - For 25% off your first order, go to DrinkHydrant.com and enter promo code forever35 at checkout.
  • BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. 
  • SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Real-life isn’t always perfect, but with Signature Hardware it is beautiful. Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.
  • MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.
  • YOGASLEEP - Go to Yogasleep.com/FOREVER35 to save an exclusive 20% off a sound machine for natural sleep. 
  • LEAN OUT - You can purchase Lean Out by Tara Henley from your favorite audiobook retailer or visit penguinrandomhouse.ca to learn more.
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
